By COLlive reporter

A confirmed case of measles has been reported in the Williamsburg neighborhood, raising serious concern among local health professionals about the potential for a broader outbreak, particularly within the frum community. “Nobody wants their child to get measles,” warned local Crown Heights physician Dr. Eli Rosen of the Crown Heights ODA, in a message to patients. Measles is a highly contagious viral disease that can lead to severe health complications, especially in young children.
